name: shouldUpdateStatusOfOpaqueCustomResource()
description: Should track phase updates on the status of opaque custom resources and in Kubernetes events
descriptionHtml: Should track phase updates on the status of opaque custom resources and in Kubernetes events

labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a controller-coordinator developer, I would like to perform common operations against Kubernetes using a simple interface to reduce the learning curve
